entry.title: $SWELL airdrop scheduled for late Q1 (March 31st latest). $SWELL has gotten even more interesting having recently announced entering the restaking gam...
entry.summary:
$SWELL airdrop scheduled for late Q1 (March 31st latest). $SWELL has gotten even more interesting having recently announced entering the restaking game (-> Eigenlayer). You earn Pearls by minting and holding $swETH and pearls will be convertible to $SWELL tokens at the TGE.
Swell: The Voyage will end in late Q1 and Pearls will be used to claim $SWELL! 💎 Until then, here are 5 ways to max your Pearl count: 1️⃣ Stake for 30 Pearls per swETH 2️⃣ Earn 3x Pearls in the Super swETH vault 3️⃣ Refer frens for 10 Pearls each per swETH 4️⃣ Deposit in any of the L1… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745414013763436670

entry.title: 🚨 $FRAME airdrop alert 🚨 If you’ve traded NFTs on Ethereum in the past 2 years you’ll be eligible for a $FRAME airdrop. Frame is an L2 develop...
entry.summary:
🚨 $FRAME airdrop alert 🚨 If you’ve traded NFTs on Ethereum in the past 2 years you’ll be eligible for a $FRAME airdrop. Frame is an L2 developed by some top-notch devs focusing on NFTs and gaming applications. The tokens are non-transferable for now.
Frame: It's time to enter the next chapter of NFTs, together. Today, we're announcing: 1. Our initial fundraise led by @electriccapital and community members. 2. The initial airdrop of $FRAME, available to anyone whose traded an NFT on ETH the last two years. Happy Holidays! 🎄🖼️
